item.title: House Ethics Committee expected to release Gaetz report: Sources
item.description: The House Ethics Committee is expected to release its report on Matt Gaetz before the holidays, after quietly voted earlier this month to release it, ...

item.title: DOJ urges judge to deny Jan. 6 defendant's request to attend Trump inauguration
item.description: Prosecutors urged a federal judge to reject a request from a defendant convicted for participation in the Jan. 6 attack on the Capitol to attend Trump...

item.title: Johnson going forward with stopgap funding bill despite Elon Musk opposition
item.description: Elon Musk came out against Speaker Mike Johnson going forward with a stopgap government funding bill on Wednesday.

item.title: WATCH: Woman receives kidney transplant grown from pig
item.description: Towana Looney is only the fifth person in the world to receive a genetically-modified organ from a pig.

item.title: Supreme Court to hear arguments over TikTok ban on Jan. 10
item.description: The platform asked the court to step in before a Jan. 19 ban goes into effect.
